languages.text: "Я изучил данные и обнаружил машинный узел, пострадавший в результате диверсии еретиков. В работу варп-секстанта было совершено вмешательство, и дух корабля, оскорбленный подобным нарушением ритуала эксплуатации, отвергает его вычисления. Я изыскивал способ устранить ошибку и пришел к выводу, что для этого необходимо ваше участие".

"I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."
languages.original_text: "Я изучил данные и обнаружил машинный узел, пострадавший в результате диверсии еретиков. В работу варп-секстанта было совершено вмешательство, и дух корабля, оскорбленный подобным нарушением ритуала эксплуатации, отвергает его вычисления. Я изыскивал способ устранить ошибку и пришел к выводу, что для этого необходимо ваше участие".

traits.locale_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp-sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the operation ritual, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

"I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp-sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the operation ritual, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

"I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp-sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the operation ritual, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

"I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp-sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

languages.text: “我检查了数据，发现其中一个机器节点被异端分子破坏了。亚空间六分仪的功能遭到了篡改，飞船的机魂也由于这种行为违反了操作仪典而愤怒不已，拒绝进行任何计算。我已经找到了方法来纠正这个错误，而且我得出了结论：若想纠正错误，你的参与必不可少。”
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: “我检查了数据，发现其中一个机器节点被异端分子破坏了。亚空间六分仪的功能遭到了篡改，飞船的机魂也由于这种行为违反了操作仪式而愤怒不已，拒绝进行任何计算。我已经找到了方法来纠正这个错误，而且我得出了结论：若想纠正错误，你的参与必不可少。”

languages.text: 「異端者の妨害工作により、マシンノードが損傷していることを発見したのです。ワープセクスタントが改ざんされ、その任務の儀礼に違反したことに怒った船の精霊が、計算を拒否しているのです。自分はこのエラーを修正する方法を探した結果、そのためには、陛下の参加が必要であると結論づけました」
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者の妨害工作により、マシンノードが損傷していることを発見したのです。ワープセクスタントが改ざんされ、その任務の儀礼に違反したことに怒った船の精霊が、計算を拒否しているのです。私はこのエラーを修正する方法を探し、そのためにはあなたの参加が必要であると結論づけました」
「異端者の妨害工作により、マシンノードが損傷していることを発見したのです。ワープセクスタントが改ざんされ、その任務の儀礼に違反したことに怒った船の精霊が、計算を拒否しているのです。自分はこのエラーを修正する方法を探した結果、そのためには、陛下の参加が必要であると結論づけました」

languages.text: "Ich habe beim Studium der Daten einen Maschinenknoten entdeckt, den die Sabotage der Ketzer beschädigt hatte. Die Funktionalität des Warp-Sextanten wurde gestört, und der Geist des Schiffs, erzürnt durch die Störung des Betriebsrituals, lehnt nun dessen Berechnungen ab. Ich habe einen Weg gesucht, diesen Fehler zu beheben, und denke, dass dafür Eure Beteiligung vonnöten ist."
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe beim Studium der Daten einen Maschinenknoten entdeckt, den die Sabotage der Ketzer beschädigt hatte. Die Funktionalität des Warp-Sextanten wurde gestört, und der Geist des Schiffs, erzürnt durch die Störung des Betriebsrituals, lehnt nun dessen Berechnungen ab. Ich habe einen Weg gesucht, diesen Fehler zu beheben, und denke, dass dafür Eure Beteiligung vonnöten ist."

languages.text: « J'ai étudié les données et découvert un nodule endommagé suite au sabotage perpétré par les hérétiques. Le fonctionnement du sextant Warp a été altéré, et l'esprit du vaisseau, ulcéré par cette violation du Rite d'Opération, récuse désormais ses calculs. J'ai cherché un moyen de rectifier cette erreur et conclu que votre participation était requise. »
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai étudié les données et découvert un nodule endommagé suite au sabotage perpétré par les hérétiques. Le fonctionnement du sextant Warp a été altéré, et l'esprit du vaisseau, ulcéré par cette violation du rituel opératoire, récuse désormais ses calculs. J'ai cherché un moyen de rectifier cette erreur et conclu que votre participation était requise. »

languages.text: «Tras estudiar los datos, he descubierto un nodo máquina dañado como resultado del sabotaje de los herejes. El funcionamiento del sextante de la disformidad se había alterado y el espíritu de la nave, furioso por esta violación del Rito de Operación, rechaza sus cálculos. He buscado la forma de rectificar este error y he concluido que su participación es necesaria para lograrlo».
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Tras estudiar los datos, he descubierto un nodo máquina dañado como resultado del sabotaje de los herejes. El funcionamiento del sextante de la disformidad se había alterado y el espíritu de la nave, furioso por esta violación del ritual operativo, rechaza sus cálculos. He buscado la forma de rectificar este error y he concluido que su participación es necesaria para lograrlo».

languages.text: "Veriyi inceledim ve kâfirlerin sabotajı yüzünden hasar görmüş bir devre merkezi keşfettim. Öteboyut sekstantının işlevi üzerinde oynamalar yapılmış ve Faaliyet Ayini'nin bu şekilde ihlal edilmesine sinirlenen geminin ruhu da şu an hesaplamalarını reddediyor. Bu hatayı düzeltmek için bir yol bulmaya çalıştım ve bunu yapmak için sizin katılımınızın da şart olduğu sonucuna vardım."
languages.original_text: "I studied the data and discovered a machine node that was damaged as a result of the heretics' sabotage. The functioning of the warp sextant was tampered with and the ship's spirit, aggrieved by this violation of the Rite of Operation, is now rejecting its calculations. I sought a way to rectify this error and have concluded that your participation is necessary to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Veriyi inceledim ve kâfirlerin sabotajı sebebiyle hasar görmüş bir makine devresi keşfettim. Öteboyut sekstantının işlevi üzerinde oynamalar yapılmıştı ve Faaliyet Ayini sekteye uğratıldığı için mağdur durumda olan geminin ruhu şu an hesaplamalarını reddediyor. Bu hatayı düzeltmek için bir yol bulmaya çalıştım ve bunu yapmak için senin katılımının da gerekli olduğu sonucuna vardım."
